name: Hexania
description:
Hexania is an indie RTS-Game where you can build your kingdom. The world is made of hexagons and simple structures. The main goal is to conquer all castles.

  • 200+ Levels
  • 4 Game Modes + Tutorial
  • 10+ Landscapes
  • 4 Border Colors
  • 8 Buildings
  • 20+ Structures
  • Endless fun :)
